players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, any idea why Diana might have been targeted?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
Bob: "Charlie, that's a bold claim. How do we know you're really the detective and not just another villager trying to throw suspicion on me?"
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why do you think Diana was targeted instead of you?"

Charlie: "Bob is trying to sow doubt, a typical mafia tactic. I was likely spared because the mafia would assume my claim could be questioned. Let's focus on the evidence: I investigated Bob, and he's the mafioso."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your findings immediately at the start of the day? It seems suspicious to wait until now, almost as if you're making it up on the spot."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."

Alice: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why do you think Diana was targeted instead of you?"

Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your findings immediately at the start of the day? It seems suspicious to wait until now, almost as if you're making it up on the spot."
